wikipedia_page.main: Harry Parkes (4 January 1920 – 4 March 2009) was an English footballer of the 1940s and 1950s. Parkes was a one club man having only played for Aston Villa. He is widely regarded as one of Aston Villa's most popular players of all-time.

response: * Harry Parkes (diplomat) (1828–1885), British consul in China and Japan
* Harry Parkes (footballer, born 1888), (1888–1947), English footballer and manager
*Harry Parkes (footballer, born 1888) (1888–1947), English footballer and manager in the 1920s and 1930s
*Harry Parkes (footballer, born 1920) (1920–2009), English footballer of the 1940s and 1950s for Aston Villa
